quote: We are learning, too, that the love of beauty is one of Nature's greatest healers.
author: Ellsworth Huntington

quote: As a busy working mom I'm always pressed for time, so a quick and easy beauty routine is key!
author: Angela Kinsey

quote: My mother was very, very beautiful, and I saw that the beautiful women around me were often constrained not only by their beauty but by the way that being an object of male desire frequently caused violence in their lives. And it caused them to be constrained in these terribly sad ways - their brilliance was not valued.
author: Emil Ferris

quote: The last thing left in nature is the beauty of women.
author: Peter Beard

quote: The loss of courtship in modern days - like, people don't court anybody anymore. There's no beauty about it.
author: Sofia Vassilieva

quote: A women's greatest asset is her beauty.
author: Alex Comfort

quote: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within - strength, courage, dignity.
author: Ruby Dee

quote: Most sets of values would give rise to universes that, although they might be very beautiful, would contain no one able to wonder at that beauty.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Perfect is boring: Beauty is irregular.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Beauty is only skin deep. I think what's really important is finding a balance of mind, body and spirit.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: One of the big, most underlying messages for me is celebrating beauty that is not typical.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: Because beauty will be so readily accessible, and skin color and features will be similar, prejudices based on physical features will be nearly eradicated. Prejudice will be socioeconomically based.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: The 1990s, after the reign of terror of academic vandalism, will be a decade of restoration: restoration of meaning, value, beauty, pleasure, and emotion to art and restoration of art to its audience.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: A lot of punk rock is not going to be in the mainstream. It's below the radar. The beauty of it is that you're not supposed to always know. It's subterranean.
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: People tend not to use this word beauty because it's not intellectual - but there has to be an overlap between beauty and intellect.
author: Tadao Ando

quote: I'm such an avid magazine reader - music, art, beauty magazines - and I found that food and restaurants were pouring into everything I cared about. Whether it was the pop-up concept, or some mysterious mini-mall restaurant, I got swept up in the sexy romance of the food movement.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: How much we need, in the church and in society, witnesses of the beauty of holiness, witnesses of the splendour of truth, witnesses of the joy and freedom born of a living relationship with Christ!
author: Pope Benedict XVI

quote: What is man's ultimate direction in life? It is to look for love, truth, virtue, and beauty.
author: Shinichi Suzuki

quote: Death is the mother of Beauty; hence from her, alone, shall come fulfillment to our dreams and our desires.
author: Wallace Stevens

quote: People, unprotected by their roles, become isolated in beauty and intellect and illness and confusion.
author: Richard Avedon

quote: Music, as many people have said, is the universal language. Of course points are made which make you think about things, but ultimately it makes you feel. And that's why people remember more songs that have meant something during their life than films. They start to define periods in your life, and that's kind of the beauty of it.
author: Scott Weiland

quote: I recognize in thieves, traitors and murderers, in the ruthless and the cunning, a deep beauty - a sunken beauty.
author: Jean Genet

quote: Parisian women have an inner elegance that's envied the world over. They are so relaxed about ageing and seem to acquire more charisma and beauty with time. Who wouldn't want to be like them? That's the trick - to embrace the natural progression of life and to be confident.
author: Naomi Watts

quote: Oh! this opponent, this collaborator against your will, whose notion of beauty always differs from yours and whose means are often too limited for active assistance to your intentions!
author: Alexander Alekhine

quote: For me, writing is an experience. It's an exercise in which I want to discover myself by taking my characters to the edges of human experience, to the edges of themselves and then, asking certain questions - about love, what does it mean to love? What's beauty? What is true beauty? What does it mean to be insane - crazy?
author: Ted Dekker

quote: Beauty of mind creates freedom. Freedom of mind creates beauty.
author: Ann Demeulemeester

quote: Beauty is a relation, and the apprehension of it a comparison.
author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quote: As we all know, there is inner beauty and outer beauty. If we examine inner beauty, to me there is nothing more beautiful than inner peace, in a man or a woman.
author: Alice Greczyn

quote: I shall give you hunger, and pain, and sleepless nights. Also beauty, and satisfactions known to few, and glimpses of the heavenly life. None of these you shall have continually, and of their coming and going you shall not be foretold.
author: Howard Lindsay

quote: That's one of the nice things. I mean, part of the beauty of me is that I'm very rich. So if I need $600 million, I can put $600 million myself. That's a huge advantage. I must tell you, that's a huge advantage over the other candidates.
author: Donald Trump

quote: For thousands of years, human beings have been obsessed with beauty, truth, love, honor, altruism, courage, social relationships, art, and God. They all go together as subjective experiences, and it's a straw man to set God up as the delusion. If he is, then so is truth itself or beauty itself.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Everybody know, I don't do no promoting. I don't ever have to promote nothing, that's the beauty of Lil Wayne.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: I have been overcome by the beauty and richness of our life together, those early mornings setting out, those evenings gleaming with rivers and lakes below us, still holding the last light.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: I used to switch up my cologne every two to three months, get a new wave - Dolce, Versace, Burberry. But Black Orchid, that joint stayed. That's the smell of beauty that stays on you... and girls love Tom Ford.
author: Wale

quote: That I may have the soul-life, the soul-nature, let divine beauty bring to me divine soul.
author: Richard Jefferies

quote: Not longer loved or fostered by religion, beauty is lifted from its face as a mask, and its absence exposes features on that face which threaten to become incomprehensible to man.
author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quote: I am concerned about ageism and the loss of beauty - the perception that as you grow older, you 'lose your looks,' which I think is diabolical.
author: Erin O'Connor

quote: When my editor sent me the first two images of Joker's daughter, I was struck by how confident she looked despite her boney appearance and horribly scarred face. So I starting thinking, how did Duela gain such confidence in a world that prizes beauty?
author: Ann Nocenti

quote: Art is the unceasing effort to compete with the beauty of flowers - and never succeeding.
author: Gian Carlo Menotti

quote: I remember reminding myself that beauty is an opinion, not a fact. And it has always made me feel better.
author: Hayden Panettiere

quote: The beauty of making theater is that you have to go and do it the next day. Making a show nightly is a really difficult skill. It's something every theater actor and every theater maker is challenged with.
author: Thomas Kail

quote: A lot of technologies in the world were unusual in the beginning, and became standard. That's the beauty of bottom-up entrepreneurship and innovations.
author: Iqbal Quadir

quote: Beauty is that quality which, next to money, is generally the most attractive to the worst kinds of men; and, therefore, it is likely to entail a great deal of trouble on the possessor.
author: Anne Bronte

quote: Do not waste time dreaming of great faraway opportunities; do the best you can where you are. Open your petals of power and beauty and fling out the fragrance of your life in the place that has been assigned to you.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: We all have our imperfections. But I'm human, and you know, it's important to concentrate on other qualities besides outer beauty.
author: Beyonce Knowles

quote: I think part of the beauty of our relationship with jewelry is that it can change and evolve as we do ourselves.
author: Erika Christensen

quote: For most people, we often marvel at the beauty of a sunrise or the magnificence of a full moon, but it is impossible to fathom the magnitude of the universe that surrounds us.
author: Richard H. Baker

quote: Beauty may be skin deep, but ugly goes clear to the bone.
author: Redd Foxx

quote: Beauty is about perception, not about make-up. I think the beginning of all beauty is knowing and liking oneself. You can't put on make-up, or dress yourself, or do you hair with any sort of fun or joy if you're doing it from a position of correction.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
author: Oliver Platt

quote: People say I'm extravagant because I want to be surrounded by beauty. But tell me, who wants to be surrounded by garbage?
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: Beauty is not caused. It is.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: When I was a seminarian, I was dazzled by a girl I met at an uncle's wedding. I was surprised by her beauty, her intellectual brilliance... and, well, I was bowled over for quite a while.
author: Pope Francis

quote: In a meadow full of flowers, you cannot walk through and breathe those smells and see all those colors and remain angry. We have to support the beauty, the poetry, of life.
author: Jonas Mekas

quote: Aging has a wonderful beauty and we should have respect for that.
author: Eartha Kitt

quote: Learning to love my inner and outer beauty wasn't an easy road. I still don't always love the reflection I see in the mirror, but I have learned that my outer appearance does not define me.
author: Katherine Schwarzenegger

quote: The pursuit of truth and beauty is a sphere of activity in which we are permitted to remain children all our lives.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The perception of beauty is a moral test.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Like the rest of the genetic lottery, beauty is unfair. Everyone falls short of perfection, but some are luckier than others. Real confidence requires self-knowledge, which includes recognizing one's shortcomings as well as one's strengths.
author: Virginia Postrel

quote: The problem with beauty is that it's like being born rich and getting poorer.
author: Joan Collins

quote: People say I am the king of painful shoes. I don't want to create painful shoes, but it is not my job to create something comfortable. I try to make high heels as comfortable as they can be, but my priority is design, beauty and sexiness. I'm not against them, but comfort is not my focus.
author: Christian Louboutin

quote: When you feel great, you emanate a certain energy that translates as beautiful. I don't care if you have the standard beauty or not; it's that X-factor that comes through, and the basis of that is good health.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: I like the idea of being warm and secure. That's what home should be. That you have a sense of warmth, security, love, and you love the things around you and surround yourself with beauty.
author: Andre Leon Talley

quote: I think Islam has been hijacked by the idea that all Muslims are terrorists; that Islam is about hate, about war, about jihad - I think that hijacks the spirituality and beauty that exists within Islam. I believe in allowing Islam to be seen in context and in its entirety and being judged on what it really is, not what you think it is.
author: Aasif Mandvi

quote: The beauty of the world, which is so soon to perish, has two edges, one of laughter, one of anguish, cutting the heart asunder.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: We all find joy and radiance and a reason to move on even in the most dire of circumstances. Even in chaos and madness, there's still a beauty that comes from just the vibrancy of another human spirit.
author: Ishmael Beah

quote: The artist forges himself to the others, midway between the beauty he cannot do without and the community he cannot tear himself away from. That is why true artists scorn nothing: they are obliged to understand rather than to judge.
author: Albert Camus

quote: She got her looks from her father. He's a plastic surgeon.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: The grass is always greener on the other side. We are busy applying fairness creams while people in the West go bare-bodied on the beach to get a tan. Indian girls have ruled the roost when it comes to beauty pageants. I flaunt my complexion, and I am proud to be noticed as an Indian wherever I go.
author: Shilpa Shetty

quote: The value of beauty and inspiration is very much underrated, no question. But I want to be clear: I'm not trying to be anyone's savior. I'm just trying to think about the future and not be sad.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Beauty is nature's brag, and must be shown in courts, at feasts, and high solemnities, where most may wonder at the workmanship.
author: John Milton

quote: Whenever I talk about the Bahamas and its beauty, I could never stop talking about my God, who has given us all of this beauty.
author: Myles Munroe

quote: When I think of art I think of beauty. Beauty is the mystery of life. It is not in the eye it is in the mind. In our minds there is awareness of perfection.
author: Agnes Martin

quote: The arts, quite simply, nourish the soul. They sustain, comfort, inspire. There is nothing like that exquisite moment when you first discover the beauty of connecting with others in celebration of larger ideals and shared wisdom.
author: Gordon Gee

quote: We have to get back to the beauty of just being alive in this present moment.
author: Mary McDonnell

quote: I believe that children are our future. Teach them well and let them lead the way. Show them all the beauty they possess inside.
author: Whitney Houston

quote: A thing is right when it tends to preserve the integrity, stability and beauty of the biotic community. It is wrong when it tends otherwise.
author: Aldo Leopold

quote: Really, at the end of the day, the only thing you can control is yourself; the only person you can truly educate is yourself. You have to redefine what beauty is to you so you can't be affected by what people are saying.
author: Rupi Kaur

quote: There's something about the Pacific Northwest, the scale of it, and the fact that not so long ago people came here and died getting here, and then died the first winter they were here. There's this breathtaking beauty, just a little bit of moss on the tree, just this little thread of danger, and the sinister. And I really like that.
author: Chelsea Cain

quote: I think we live in a world where the most important thing is daily life: sharing a space with your family, making meals, being with your people. It's not only the idea of privacy, it's the beauty of the moment, at a time in the world when everything goes really fast - too fast.
author: Ana Tijoux

quote: Beauty awakens the soul to act.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: When you come up with a theory, you fall in love with the beauty the simplicity and elegance of it. But then you have to get a sheet of paper and pencil and crack out all the details. Hundreds and hundreds of pages. Because you have to prove it.
author: Michio Kaku

quote: Our scientific age demands that we provide definitions, measurements, and statistics in order to be taken seriously. Yet most of the important things in life cannot be precisely defined or measured. Can we define or measure love, beauty, friendship, or decency, for example?
author: Dennis Prager

quote: My dream is that people will find a way back home, into their bodies, to connect with the earth, to connect with each other, to connect with the poor, to connect with the broken, to connect with the needy, to connect with people calling out all around us, to connect with the beauty, poetry, the wildness.
author: Eve Ensler

quote: If in my youth I had realized that the sustaining splendour of beauty of with which I was in love would one day flood back into my heart, there to ignite a flame that would torture me without end, how gladly would I have put out the light in my eyes.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Nothing surpasses the beauty and elegance of a bad idea.
author: Craig Bruce

quote: I think we should all be tolerant of each other and embrace each others' strengths and differences and uniqueness and beauty.
author: Martina McBride

quote: I know that I've got big ears and a big forehead and that my hair sticks up. But I'm happy with myself. I'm not necessarily trying to win a beauty pageant here.
author: Clay Aiken

quote: Every article on these islands has an almost personal character, which gives this simple life, where all art is unknown, something of the artistic beauty of medieval life.
author: John Millington Synge

quote: In the end, long life is the reward, strength, and beauty.
author: Grace Paley

quote: Beauty is in the character of a person. It's about having an interesting face and about what's inside. Anyone can take a good picture.
author: Patrick Demarchelier

quote: I am a thing of beauty.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: The architect should strive continually to simplify; the ensemble of the rooms should then be carefully considered that comfort and utility may go hand in hand with beauty.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Pay attention to the beauty surrounding you.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Nonsense and beauty have close connections.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: Just try the effect of putting beauty into your life, a little every day. You will find it magical. It will broaden and light up your outlook upon the world as the acquisition of money or fame never can.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: I gave my beauty and my youth to men. I am going to give my wisdom and experience to animals.
author: Brigitte Bardot

quote: There is beauty when something works and it works intuitively.
author: Jonathan Ive

quote: Beauty and fashion are not really local anymore. You really have to be a global citizen to know what trends are. Now, it's pretty much the same designers and the same kind of trends, whether I am in New York, Milan, or Mumbai - it's the same.
author: Priyanka Chopra

quote: When buying beauty products, I always check the ingredients. The product should be sourced from natural ingredients. It should have not been tested on animals, as I am against animal testing, and it should be soft on the skin.
author: Jacqueline Fernandez

quote: Beauty makes idiots sad and wise men merry.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: Beauty doesn't need ornaments. Softness can't bear the weight of ornaments.
author: Munshi Premchand

quote: Remember always that the composer's pen is still mightier than the bow of the violinist; in you lie all the possibilities of the creation of beauty.
author: John Philip Sousa

quote: I know a lot of aesthetically beautiful women who are not nice people, and they do not come across as beautiful to me. I think the number one thing for beauty is a smile. I love a woman with a beautiful smile.
author: Sara Foster

quote: The human face is the organic seat of beauty. It is the register of value in development, a record of Experience, whose legitimate office is to perfect the life, a legible language to those who will study it, of the majestic mistress, the soul.
author: Eliza Farnham

quote: Alas! how little does the memory of these human inhabitants enhance the beauty of the landscape!
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I'm no natural beauty. If I'm gonna have any looks at all, I'm gonna have to create them.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: Dear God! how beauty varies in nature and art. In a woman the flesh must be like marble; in a statue the marble must be like flesh.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Great perils have this beauty, that they bring to light the fraternity of strangers.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Global warming will threaten our crops, so natural food will be scarce. Hourglass, curvy bodies will be the aspirational beauty standard, representing that those women have access to bounties of fulfilling yet healthy food, which means they are affluent.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: Light, God's eldest daughter, is a principal beauty in a building.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Courtesy is a silver lining around the dark clouds of civilization; it is the best part of refinement and in many ways, an art of heroic beauty in the vast gallery of man's cruelty and baseness.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: That's why I began doing makeup in the first place: I was hoping that through helping people see the beauty in themselves, I could try and find it in me.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: Why is it that scuba divers and surfers are some of the strongest advocates of ocean conservation? Because they've spent time in and around the ocean, and they've personally seen the beauty, the fragility, and even the degradation of our planet's blue heart.
author: Sylvia Earle

quote: She gave up beauty in her tender youth, gave all her hope and joy and pleasant ways; she covered up her eyes lest they should gaze on vanity, and chose the bitter truth.
author: Christina Rossetti

quote: All the freaky people make the beauty of the world.
author: Michael Franti

quote: The original theme of 'Beauty and the Beast' is don't judge a book by its cover. Love what's inside.
author: Jay Ryan

quote: Anything in any way beautiful derives its beauty from itself and asks nothing beyond itself. Praise is no part of it, for nothing is made worse or better by praise.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Only on paper has humanity yet achieved glory, beauty, truth, knowledge, virtue, and abiding love.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Beauty is the promise of happiness.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: The beauty, the poetry of the fear in their eyes. I didn't mind going to jail for, what, five, six hours? It was absolutely worth it.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: The beauty of Hawaii probably surpasses other places. I like the Big Island and the two mountains, Mauna Loa and Mauna Kea, where you can look out at the stars.
author: Buzz Aldrin

quote: Beauty, to me, is kind, generous, and people that are humble.
author: Nikki Sixx

quote: I think that with beauty, people jump to the end instead of starting from the beginning with a good lotion or prep.
author: Kat Graham

quote: It is still breathtaking to me to watch people bring love, preciousness and kindness to their inner world, allowing the light of God to shine through their eyes so that the beauty of their soul can come forth.
author: Debbie Ford

quote: A sculptor wields The chisel, and the stricken marble grows To beauty.
author: William C. Bryant

quote: We were astonished by the beauty and refinement of the art displayed by the objects surpassing all we could have imagined - the impression was overwhelming.
author: Howard Carter

quote: This idea that being youthful is the only thing that's beautiful or attractive simply isn't true. I don't want to be an 'ageless beauty.' I want to be a woman who is the best I can be at my age.
author: Sharon Stone

quote: The beauty of Captain America is that you didn't have to come from a distant planet, like Superman, or he didn't have to be born into a family of billionaires like Bruce Wayne. He happened to be in the right place at the right time, and someone gave him a magic potion, and he grew muscles and became a superhero.
author: Mark Waid

quote: A day spent without the sight or sound of beauty, the contemplation of mystery, or the search of truth or perfection is a poverty-stricken day; and a succession of such days is fatal to human life.
author: Lewis Mumford

quote: I purposefully try to make films in that grey area, where things are morally ambiguous. It's like life: good people do horrible things, and bad people do good things, and there's beauty in horror and horror in beauty.
author: Harmony Korine

quote: Faith goes out through the window when beauty comes in at the door.
author: George Edward Moore

quote: One of the things that people don't realize is that that natural beauty, those recreational forests, they have an economic development impact for the state as well.
author: Ed Rendell

quote: For me beauty is valued more than anything - the beauty that is manifest in a curved line or in an act of creativity.
author: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: Ever since studying in Russia as a college student, I had been in a long-distance, one-sided love affair with Chechnya's remarkable history, culture and rugged natural beauty.
author: Anthony Marra

quote: Going around Rome, you can find beauty because, quite simply, Rome is very beautiful. But the beauty of the people is sometimes harder to discover.
author: Paolo Sorrentino

quote: The rainforest has an intense beauty that at times seems almost suffocating. The jungle is one twig short of impenetrable, and the greenery seems to crowd in on you with a sensation that has been described as akin to snow blindness.
author: Mark Barrowcliffe

quote: The destruction of the natural beauty, the ecosystems, and the majesty of mountains affect us in ways we're not even aware of. Every time a mountain is beheaded, we chop off a little part of our souls.
author: Gloria Reuben

quote: I have beauty, intelligence, individuality, sensuality and sexuality.
author: Shannon Tweed

quote: Ugliness is in a way superior to beauty because it lasts.
author: Serge Gainsbourg

quote: There is something terribly morbid in the modern sympathy with pain. One should sympathise with the colour, the beauty, the joy of life. The less said about life's sores the better.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Nothing can express the aim and meaning of our work better than the profound words of St. Augustine - 'Beauty is the splendor of Truth.'
author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: My beauty ethos? Well, I'd love to tell you it's something like 'less is more,' but honestly, it all starts with happiness. If only someone could bottle that up - when I'm happy, I'm at my most radiant and glowing. It does me better than any product ever could. And I stand by how cheesy and cliched that sounds.
author: Solange Knowles

quote: You can't really say what is beautiful about a place, but the image of the place will remain vividly with you.
author: Tadao Ando

quote: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together.
author: Petrarch

quote: Beauty is whatever gives joy.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: Beauty is grace and confidence. I've learned to accept and appreciate what nature gave me.
author: Lindsay Lohan

quote: If you go through life, and you don't find the beauty in an unexpected place, then you really have a sad existence.
author: Octavia Spencer

quote: Poetry and beauty are always making peace. When you read something beautiful you find coexistence; it breaks walls down.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: I had seen the ballet of 'Swan Lake' as a child but it was as an adult, when I saw a production featuring Erik Bruhn, that I first noticed how significant a part the ever-present threat of violence played. This juxtaposition of great beauty and grace with a backdrop of pure evil stayed with me for years.
author: Walter Dean Myers

quote: It's sad when girls think they don't have anything going on except being pretty.
author: Keri Russell

quote: Women who stay true to themselves are always more interesting and beautiful to me: women like Frida Kahlo, Georgia O'Keeffe and Anna Magnani - women who have style, chic, allure and elegance. They didn't submit to any standard of beauty - they defined it.
author: Isabella Rossellini

quote: We all know the future is mobile, right? And the iPhone and iPad are Perfect Expressions of Beauty, Ideal Combinations of Form and Function. Except they're Not.
author: John Battelle

quote: If you can visualize the whole of spring and see Paradise with the eye of belief, you may understand the utter majesty of everlasting Beauty. If you respond to that Beauty with the beauty of belief and worship, you will be a most beautiful creature.
author: Said Nursi

quote: I like to embrace natural beauty. I try to get at least 8 hours of sleep, drinking a lot of water and exercising.
author: Tia Mowry

quote: I like to think that today is the best day of my life and tomorrow will be the next best day of my life. And if you think that way, you're living for the beauty of today.
author: Conrad Anker

quote: I know people who've had a nose job, and they've walked out feeling a million dollars, and their confidence is tenfold. Good on them! Natural beauty comes in all different shapes and sizes, but if you think surgery would right something you have a problem with, then why shouldn't you do it?
author: Louise Nurding

quote: It is easy to be beautiful; it is difficult to appear so.
author: Hosea Ballou

quote: I'm only wanted by directors for the image I give off, and it makes me angry. I always wanted to be an actor and not a beauty pageant winner.
author: Jude Law

quote: The really magical things are the ones that happen right in front of you. A lot of the time you keep looking for beauty, but it is already there. And if you look with a bit more intention, you see it.
author: Vik Muniz

quote: Most of us who become experimental physicists do so for two reasons; we love the tools of physics because to us they have intrinsic beauty, and we dream of finding new secrets of nature as important and as exciting as those uncovered by our scientific heroes.
author: Luis Walter Alvarez

quote: In the central place of every heart, there is a recording chamber; so long as it receives messages of beauty, hope, cheer and courage, you are young.
author: Samuel Ullman

quote: It is not sufficient to see and to know the beauty of a work. We must feel and be affected by it.
author: Voltaire

quote: I define nothing. Not beauty, not patriotism. I take each thing as it is, without prior rules about what it should be.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: To love beauty is to see light.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Praise or blame has but a momentary effect on the man whose love of beauty in the abstract makes him a severe critic on his own works.
author: John Keats

quote: Wisdom is the abstract of the past, but beauty is the promise of the future.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: In my first year or so at the 'Post,' I began to write with some frequency on the least important issues - so-called light editorials. The titles themselves are revealing of just how light: 'On Being a Horse,' 'Brains and Beauty,' 'Mixed Drinks,' 'Lou Gehrig,' and 'Spotted Fever.'
author: Katharine Graham

quote: Cosmetics makers have always sold 'hope in a jar' - creams and potions that promise youth, beauty, sex appeal, and even love for the women who use them.
author: Virginia Postrel

quote: The most common error made in matters of appearance is the belief that one should disdain the superficial and let the true beauty of one's soul shine through. If there are places on your body where this is a possibility, you are not attractive - you are leaking.
author: Charles Lamb

quote: Nothing you'll read as breaking news will ever hold a candle to the sheer beauty of settled science. Textbook science has carefully phrased explanations for new students, math derived step by step, plenty of experiments as illustration, and test problems.
author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

quote: Now, I'm not saying I'm fashionable, but there are sociological interests that matter to me, things that are theoretical, political, intellectual and also concerned with vanity and beauty that we all think about but that I try to mix up and translate into fashion.
author: Miuccia Prada

quote: I like the thought that what we are to do on this earth is embellish it for its greater beauty, so that oncoming generations can look back to the shapes we leave here and get the same thrill that I get in looking back at theirs - at the Parthenon, at Chartres Cathedral.
author: Philip Johnson

quote: I am obsessed with beauty. I want everything to be perfect, and of course it isn't. And that's a tough place to be because you're never satisfied.
author: Robert Mapplethorpe

quote: Integrity reveals beauty.
author: Thomas Leonard

quote: I don't have any beauty shop memories. I remember the barber shop.
author: Jenifer Lewis

quote: A bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: Nothing will teach you more about perceived value than taking something with literally no value and selling it in the auction format. It teaches you the beauty and power of presentation, and how you can make magic out of nothing.
author: Sophia Amoruso

quote: Beauty is the first test: there is no permanent place in the world for ugly mathematics.
author: G. H. Hardy

quote: Inner beauty radiates from within, and there's nothing more beautiful than when a woman feels beautiful on the inside.
author: Erin Heatherton

quote: I always say you can never be extravagant with beauty. Beauty is God made real. Beauty is life.
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: 'Beauty' is a currency system like the gold standard. Like any economy, it is determined by politics, and in the modern age in the West is is the last, best belief system that keeps male dominance intact.
author: Naomi Wolf

quote: I didn't grow up around wild horses, no. But I've appreciated their beauty and their power ever since I can remember.
author: Ricky Schroder

quote: I see flaws as a kind of beauty.
author: Karan Mahajan

quote: As long as I love Beauty I am young.
author: W. H. Davies

quote: My theory of characterization is basically this: Put some dirt on a hero, and put some sunshine on the villain, one brush stroke of beauty on the villain.
author: Justin Cronin

quote: Genetics is all about showcasing human beauty along with high-quality performance.
author: Bela Karolyi

quote: Most people can't see beauty and love. I see our music as medicine.
author: Maurice White

quote: Red lipstick has been my beauty staple for years. I show up to Pilates or yoga at 8 A.M. wearing my red lipstick.
author: Liz Goldwyn

quote: In such ugly times, the only true protest is beauty.
author: Phil Ochs

quote: What saddens me is the corruption of youth and beauty, and the loss of soul, which is only replaced by money.
author: Lisa Bonet

quote: There is real beauty in my eyes when I lose my mind.
author: Jessica Hagedorn

quote: High heels are like a beauty lift. In a flat, you can feel beautiful, but a stiletto changes your mood, how you move - like a wild, beautiful animal. The idea was always to follow a woman's wardrobe, her desires.
author: Giuseppe Zanotti

quote: 'Changes in Latitudes' began when I was looking at a photograph of a sea turtle swimming underwater. I had such a strong feeling for the beauty of this ancient creature, at home in the sea. On the spot, I wanted to swim with that turtle. I began to imagine a character who would do just that.
author: Will Hobbs

quote: God put the human race in charge of managing the resources of the entire planet for the benefit of all life. Therefore, we, of all people on this planet, should be concerned about environmental issues and doing what we can to enhance the beauty and productivity of the natural realm.
author: Hugh Ross

quote: I think exercise tests us in so many ways, our skills, our hearts, our ability to bounce back after setbacks. This is the inner beauty of sports and competition, and it can serve us all well as adult athletes.
author: Peggy Fleming

quote: Where is there beauty when you see deprivation and starvation?
author: Rosalind Russell

quote: The beauty of having short hair is that I actually can wash and style it at home!
author: Meagan Good

quote: Beauty without grace is the hook without the bait.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty has as many meanings as man has moods. Beauty is the symbol of symbols. Beauty reveals everything, because it expresses nothing. When it shows us itself, it shows us the whole fiery-coloured world.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The waving of a pine tree on the top of a mountain - a magic wand in Nature's hand - every devout mountaineer knows its power; but the marvelous beauty value of what the Scotch call a breckan in a still dell, what poet has sung this?
author: John Muir

quote: These are the things of which men think, who live: of their own selves and the dwelling place of their fathers; of their neighbors; of work and service; of rule and reason and women and children; of Beauty and Death and War.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: With a great poet the sense of Beauty overcomes every other consideration, or rather obliterates all consideration.
author: John Keats

quote: Beauty arises out of human inspiration.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: I marketed pens - on the phone. But the beauty of the gig was that you had to call these strangers and say, 'Hi, how ya doing?' You made up a name, like, 'Hey, it's Edward Quartermaine from California. You're eligible to receive this grandfather clock or a trip to Tahiti.' You promise them all these things if they buy a gross of pens.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: I have never before, in my long and eclectic career, been gifted with such an abundance of natural beauty as I experienced filming 'War Horse' on Dartmoor.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: Humanism was not wrong in thinking that truth, beauty, liberty, and equality are of infinite value, but in thinking that man can get them for himself without grace.
author: Simone Weil

quote: Beauty is not all there is of poetry. It must contain the truth. It is not simply an oak, rude and grand, neither is it simply a vine. It is both. Around the oak of truth runs the vine of beauty.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: The experience of being in the Army changed my whole life; I never believed that an organization such as ours could ever go to war, leave alone win it. It was, as Yeats remarked of the Easter Rising, 'A terrible beauty.'
author: Spike Milligan

quote: If you get simple beauty and naught else, you get about the best thing God invents.
author: Robert Browning

quote: That's the beauty of the Internet is that we're no longer tied to our communities by physical connections.
author: Edward Snowden

quote: No spring nor summer beauty hath such grace as I have seen in one autumnal face.
author: John Donne

quote: Everybody does what she needs. And if you want plastic surgery, and then you feel better, why not? There is no law. I've nothing against using something to help your beauty - but do it in a good way, with intelligence.
author: Monica Bellucci

quote: People are fighting over how our heartsongs are different. But they don't need to be the same. That's the beauty. We are a mosaic of gifts. Each of us has our inner beauty no matter how we look.
author: Mattie Stepanek

quote: It took a long while for me to know that I'm beautiful. I remember going through this phase when I was younger of wanting to pass by mirrors and not look at them. That was so ridiculous. I've learned now that beauty starts from within.
author: Kelly Rowland

quote: Beauty is ever to the lonely mind a shadow fleeting; she is never plain. She is a visitor who leaves behind the gift of grief, the souvenir of pain.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Beauty is subjective and should not be limited to only what we see on the outside.
author: Alek Wek

quote: For my first fragrance, I wanted to capture the essence of a woman's strength and beauty.
author: Ivanka Trump

quote: When I learned to sign and speak at the same time, the whole world opened up to me. That's the beauty of encouraging kids who are deaf to use whatever it takes to communicate.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: Beauty and brains, pleasure and usability - they should go hand in hand.
author: Donald Norman

quote: I don't really have a beauty routine. I always use coconut oil, and I always wear mascara. That's kind of it! I'm pretty simple.
author: Zoe Kravitz

quote: Every day that I live, I try to find the beauty in things.
author: Octavia Spencer

quote: I think each woman has her own relationship to beauty.
author: Christy Turlington

quote: Grace is in garments, in movements, in manners; beauty in the nude, and in forms. This is true of bodies; but when we speak of feelings, beauty is in their spirituality, and grace in their moderation.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: Men want a battle to fight, an adventure to live, and a beauty to rescue. That is what is written in their hearts. That is what little boys play at. That is what men's movies are about. You just see it. It is undeniable.
author: John Eldredge

quote: There is something special about the beauty in the unclear, the ambiguity, the in-between that you can't totally recognise.
author: Alessandro Michele

quote: Whether it's an ad or organic content, video provides a new creative dimension for storytelling on 'Instagram'. Video lets people convey the power and beauty in a moment through sight, sound, and motion.
author: Kevin Systrom

quote: Beauty shouldn't be superficial and should come from within, and your eyes will tell the story.
author: Michelle Yeoh

quote: My definition of love is being full. Complete. It makes everything lighter. Beauty is something you see. Love is something you feel.
author: Sharon Tate

quote: You, too, women, cast away all the cowards from your embraces; they will give you only cowards for children, and you who are the daughters of the land of beauty must bear children who are noble and brave.
author: Giuseppe Garibaldi

quote: There's a beauty to math. Math is so simple. It's just one step after the next.
author: Ethan Canin

quote: There are so many Muslim women that feel like they don't fit society's standard of beauty. I just wanted to tell them it's OK to be different; being different is beautiful, too.
author: Halima Aden

quote: I think it's evident that expensive neighborhoods in Seattle are surrounded by natural beauty. That elevates city life. So if we can make cities more attractive in the long run, we can be smarter about issues like development, zoning and economics.
author: Stone Gossard

quote: I think everybody can be beautiful. Anybody can have beauty. It's about how you look at the world, in a way, and how you treat yourself.
author: Elizabeth Peyton

quote: No state can match the beauty of the Chesapeake Bay, our beaches and farms, or the mountains of Western Maryland, the Port of Baltimore, or the historic charm of every corner of our state.
author: Larry Hogan

quote: It's how you look at beauty. Is it only an outward appearance with hair and makeup and a hot body, or is it something deeper than that?
author: Hilary Swank

quote: I learned the truth at seventeen, That love was meant for beauty queens, And high school girls with clear skinned smiles, Who married young and then retired.
author: Janis Ian

quote: Ariel may look a lot like Barbie, and her adventure may be limited to romance and over with the wedding bells, but unlike, say, Cinderella or Sleeping Beauty, she's active, brave and determined, the heroine of her own life. She even rescues the prince. And that makes her a rare fish, indeed, in the world of preschool culture.
author: Katha Pollitt

quote: I always believe that if you feel good and look happy, you're always going to be beautiful. My one actual beauty trick is pretty cliche: Never, ever go to bed with your makeup on.
author: Joyce Giraud

quote: I think that I was slightly naive. I thought that if I showed people the beauty of the Arctic and the beauty of the polar bears that they would care so much that they would stand up and try to make a change.
author: Lewis Gordon Pugh

quote: Beauty will be convulsive or will not be at all.
author: Andre Breton

quote: But, when the work was finished, the Craftsman kept wishing that there were someone to ponder the plan of so great a work, to love its beauty, and to wonder at its vastness.
author: Giovanni Pico della Mirandola

quote: I became interested in photography during my first visit to the United States. I was a student at a university in Holland. I was overwhelmed by the beauty of the American West. That was when I learned about the tradition of nature in American photography.
author: Frans Lanting

quote: Familiarity is a magician that is cruel to beauty but kind to ugliness.
author: Ouida

quote: A person however learned and qualified in his life's work in whom gratitude is absent, is devoid of that beauty of character which makes personality fragrant.
author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quote: In things to be seen at once, much variety makes confusion, another vice of beauty. In things that are not seen at once, and have no respect one to another, great variety is commendable, provided this variety transgress not the rules of optics and geometry.
author: Christopher Wren

quote: Beauty is an outward gift, which is seldom despised, except by those to whom it has been refused.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If a work of art is rich and vital and complete, those who have artistic instincts will see its beauty, and those to whom ethics appeal more strongly than aesthetics will see its moral lesson. It will fill the cowardly with terror, and the unclean will see in it their own shame.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Beauty itself is but the sensible image of the Infinite.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Nothing can be compared to the great beauty and capabilities of a soul; however keen our intellects may be, they are as unable to comprehend them as to comprehend God, for, as He has told us, He created us in His own image and likeness.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: The terrifying and edible beauty of Art Nouveau architecture.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: Beauty, whether moral or natural, is felt, more properly than perceived.
author: David Hume

quote: San Francisco is a mad city - inhabited for the most part by perfectly insane people whose women are of a remarkable beauty.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: In chess, there are some extremely beautiful things in the domain of movement, but not in the visual domain. It's the imagining of the movement or of the gesture that makes the beauty in this case.
author: Marcel Duchamp

quote: So much has been said and sung of beautiful young girls, why doesn't somebody wake up to the beauty of old women.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: Whether you come from heaven or hell, what does it matter, O Beauty!
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Beauty is the sole ambition, the exclusive goal of Taste.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: At fifteen, beauty and talent do not exist; there can only be promise of the coming woman.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: The proud depend upon the world to tell them whether they have value or not. Their self-esteem is determined by where they are judged to be on the ladders of worldly success. They feel worthwhile as individuals if the numbers beneath them in achievement, talent, beauty, or intellect are large enough.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: Beauty has a lot to do with character.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: Goodness is beauty in the best estate.
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: Love built on beauty, soon as beauty, dies.
author: John Donne

quote: The happiness I feel in having a family has brought me a real beauty.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: This is the artist, then, life's hungry man, the glutton of eternity, beauty's miser, glory's slave.
author: Tom Wolfe

quote: I am little concerned with beauty or perfection. I don't care for the great centuries. All I care about is life, struggle, intensity.
author: Emile Zola

quote: A witty woman is a treasure; a witty beauty is a power.
author: George Meredith

quote: Beauty comes from a life well lived. If you've lived well, your smile lines are in the right places, and your frown lines aren't too bad, what more do you need?
author: Jennifer Garner

quote: We tell them that we believe it will be beautiful because that is our specialty, we only create joy and beauty. We have never done a sad work. Through the drawings, we hope a majority will be able to visualize it.
author: Christo

quote: We have to nurture our young women and understand the beauty and the strength of being a woman. It's kind of a catch-22: Strength in women isn't appreciated, and vulnerability in women isn't appreciated. It's like, 'What the hell do you do?' What you do is you don't allow anyone to dictate who you are.
author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quote: I could do my own nails... I went to beauty school in the 11th grade. But why would I do that now?
author: Mariah Carey

quote: Think of things that can be created, not destroyed, and that bring beauty and joy.
author: Issey Miyake

quote: The whole beauty of music is that it goes where your words won't let you.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: We are presented with a unique situation in the black community in that we have embraced the beauty of hip hop, the real rawness of it, the real fun of it, but we also have to address the damage it has done. We have to look at what it's done to our black girls, especially when it comes to domestic violence.
author: Tamron Hall

quote: People who grew up watching Disney films like myself, there are films that are certain benchmarks in my childhood. 'The Little Mermaid' was the first movie I remember seeing. 'Beauty And The Beast,' 'Aladdin,' those are three I remember right off the bat.
author: Mandy Moore

quote: I think the beauty of Catholicism is its consistency through both successes and difficulties. I've counted on my faith to give me strength through both training and competition - but also in school, with my family and everyday life.
author: Katie Ledecky

quote: Expanding traditional energy sources like large-scale hydropower does not mean just accepting what Northern Pass has put on the table, and no one should accept Northern Pass's assertion that the only way for New England to access Canadian hydropower is to trade away the majestic beauty of the White Mountains.
author: Maggie Hassan

quote: Liturgy is like a strong tree whose beauty is derived from the continuous renewal of its leaves, but whose strength comes from the old trunk, with solid roots in the ground.
author: Pope Paul VI

quote: Alas, nothing reveals man the way war does. Nothing so accentuates in him the beauty and ugliness, the intelligence and foolishness, the brutishness and humanity, the courage and cowardice, the enigma.
author: Oriana Fallaci

quote: I've always felt like an artistic person. I can't draw or paint or sculpt. I never really had technical skills, but I've always felt like I appreciate really beautiful things, and part of taking a good photograph is being able to recognize beauty.
author: Brandon Stanton

quote: I have a great liking for the Chamba folk music, which depicts the beauty of women and the mountains with a touch of Indian classical music.
author: Mohit Chauhan

quote: Somehow a bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: When I am going out, I am in ponytail, jeans, tees. I am just like any girl-next-door. Beauty is not external; it's internal. When you are a happy soul, you would be beautiful any time.
author: Rakul Preet Singh

quote: Jordan has a strange, haunting beauty and a sense of timelessness. Dotted with the ruins of empires once great, it is the last resort of yesterday in the world of tomorrow. I love every inch of it.
author: Hussein of Jordan

quote: Filipinos don't wallow in what is miserable and ugly. They recycle the bad into things of beauty.
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: So every creative act strives to attain an absolute status; it longs to create a world of beauty to triumph over chaos and convert it to order.
author: Rowan Williams

quote: Romanticism is not just about being in a fixed state of endless beauty, because you can't live like that or live on that, that's what I've learnt.
author: Elizabeth Peyton

quote: I've learned that when God promises beauty through the ashes, He means it.
author: Taya Kyle

quote: Beauty in art is often nothing but ugliness subdued.
author: Jean Rostand

quote: The older I get, and the more collections I do, the more I'm driven by real style and beauty. My aim is to reveal and not to display women.
author: Phoebe Philo

quote: I started my YouTube channel when I was 13. At the time, I was being bullied by a few people who I used to be very close to. I felt very alone and unmotivated. After discovering the beauty community, I decided it would be a great way to express myself and use it as an outlet to be who I am.
author: Bethany Mota

quote: Form follows beauty.
author: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: I know it sounds a bit corny, but I do think that beauty and sexiness come from within.
author: Rachel Stevens

quote: Many a genius has been slow of growth. Oaks that flourish for a thousand years do not spring up into beauty like a reed.
author: George Henry Lewes

quote: If you always feel like an imposter, you work harder, and that makes you better at your job. You've got to keep a level of variation; otherwise, you'll end up talking about nails and beauty products all the time.
author: Edie Campbell

quote: I think, aesthetically, car design is so interesting - the dashboards, the steering wheels, and the beauty of the mechanics. I don't know how any of it works, I don't want to know, but it's inspirational.
author: Paloma Picasso

quote: I'm interested in form, in the shape of things. And in commitment to the degree of never letting go the quest for the meaning of things. That can come off as beauty and style, but that's not where I start from.
author: Luca Guadagnino

quote: I do take very good care of myself, and I'm always in love. And by that I mean I have an appetite for life. I'm in love with beauty and things and people and love and being in love, and those things I think, on the inside, show on the outside.
author: Gloria Vanderbilt

quote: That's the beauty of the animation process: It takes so long, you have so many chances to improve it.
author: Phil Lord

quote: I mix all different oils - my bathroom at home is littered with oils; I'm really into natural beauty and natural healing. Peppermint is really good if you put it on your stomach for a tummy ache; lavender is kind of all-purpose - I think everyone should carry it.
author: Liz Goldwyn

quote: Beauty, like truth, is relative to the time when one lives and to the individual who can grasp it. The expression of beauty is in direct ratio to the power of conception the artist has acquired.
author: Gustave Courbet

quote: It was Chicago with its World's Fair which vivified the national desire for civic beauty.
author: Daniel Burnham

quote: Science may provide the most useful way to organize empirical, reproducible data, but its power to do so is predicated on its inability to grasp the most central aspects of human life: hope, fear, love, hate, beauty, envy, honor, weakness, striving, suffering, virtue.
author: Paul Kalanithi

quote: All identity labels are umbrella terms to some degree, but this term 'bisexual' is not only serviceable, but it is sufficient. And yes, it brings together a bunch of people who are maybe shades different from one another. And maybe that's the beauty of labels: that they force you to be with other people and see the difference.
author: Charles M. Blow

quote: Beauty, more than bitterness, makes the heart break.
author: Sara Teasdale

quote: What beauty is, I know not, though it adheres to many things.
author: Albrecht Durer

quote: There is no spot of ground, however arid, bare or ugly, that cannot be tamed into such a state as may give an impression of beauty and delight.
author: Gertrude Jekyll

quote: The cottage garden; most for use designed, Yet not of beauty destitute.
author: Charlotte Smith

quote: I find great beauty in songs with a creative interpretation, but most people generally don't get that, and go for the simple songs, but I prefer something a bit more complicated, which is more meaningful to the creator.
author: Jack Jones

quote: My work reflects a relationship to the built world that shifts between control and randomness, strangeness and beauty, comfort and fear.
author: David Allee

quote: Jazz is a very democratic musical form. It comes out of a communal experience. We take our respective instruments and collectively create a thing of beauty.
author: Max Roach

quote: When a man becomes a writer, I think he takes on a sacred obligation to produce beauty and enlightenment and comfort at top speed.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: The beautiful seems right by force of beauty, and the feeble wrong because of weakness.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: I always hear myself saying, 'She's a beauty!' or 'He's a beauty!' or 'What a beauty!' but I never know what I'm talking about.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: The human soul needs actual beauty more than bread.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Sex and beauty are inseparable, like life and consciousness. And the intelligence which goes with sex and beauty, and arises out of sex and beauty, is intuition.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Well the beauty of 'Iyanla: Fix My Life' is that men are in every show. To our surprise, some of the deepest healing demonstrations have been with the men - the sons, the fathers, the husbands - because they agree to participate with the wife or the daughter or whatever it is we are looking at, and it is there.
author: Iyanla Vanzant

quote: It was one of those evenings when men feel that truth, goodness and beauty are one. In the morning, when they commit their discovery to paper, when others read it written there, it looks wholly ridiculous.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: If I weren't performing, I'd be a beauty editor or a therapist. I love creativity, but I also love to help others. My mother was a hairstylist, and they listen to everyone's problems - like a beauty therapist!
author: Beyonce Knowles

quote: If I were in the government, I would persuade the prime minister to see the beauty in the fact that people see Israel as a haven - from their sadness to their hope.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: I made myself famous by writing 'songs' and lyrics about the beauty of the things I did and ugliness, too.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: My everyday beauty routine is always rushed and pretty simple.
author: Cate Blanchett

quote: It would be difficult for me not to conclude that the most perfect type of masculine beauty is Satan, as portrayed by Milton.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Paris is one of the most beautiful places in all the world. Unfortunately, I was so homesick I couldn't appreciate its beauty.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: What is beauty, anyway? It's more than something pleasant looking. If it doesn't stop us in our tracks and make us unable to move for a moment, unable to put into words what's closing off the breath in our throats, then maybe it's pretty, but it probably isn't beauty.
author: Alan Alda

quote: I consider myself someone who takes a lot of beauty risks, and I've realized what I liar I am. I change my hair a lot, from blue to blonde to bald, but I'm trying to branch out a little more with makeup.
author: Halsey

quote: While traveling around the world, I've had the opportunity to work with every living beauty icon. I've learned to appreciate idiosyncrasy. The fact is, there is really no such thing as 'normal' - everybody's different, and that is the essence of their beauty.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: Today I see beauty everywhere I go, in every face I see, in every single soul.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: Beauty is one of the rare things which does not lead to doubt of God.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: I love beauty. But I like the beauty accidentally, not dished up, served up on a platter.
author: Wole Soyinka

quote: I would warn you that I do not attribute to nature either beauty or deformity, order or confusion. Only in relation to our imagination can things be called beautiful or ugly, well-ordered or confused.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: There is a role and function for beauty in our time.
author: Tadao Ando

quote: My mom really let us do our own thing and play with different trends, and my sister was a little older, so she had all the beauty tricks. I would stuff things like rolled-up toilet paper into my hair to get volume, or do the reverse, and I'd lie on my back, and she'd use an actual iron to straighten it.
author: Chrissy Teigen

quote: I love musicians. I think artists are the most amazing people because they're constantly creating beauty for the world. With all the crazy stuff going on in the world, then there's artists reminding us of our humanity and reminding us of our heart and soul and what really matters.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: Much of the stress and emptiness that haunt us can be traced back to our lack of attention to beauty. Internally, the mind becomes coarse and dull if it remains unvisited by images and thoughts that hold the radiance of beauty.
author: John O'Donohue

quote: It is art that makes life, makes interest, makes importance... and I know of no substitute whatever for the force and beauty of its process.
author: Henry James

quote: Whatever you may look like, marry a man your own age - as your beauty fades, so will his eyesight.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: It's a good thing that beauty is only skin deep, or I'd be rotten to the core.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Now that I have a daughter, I've been thinking about how I'll define beauty to her. I watched a video of Kendall when she was three, and she was putting on makeup. I don't know how I feel about that. But my daughter already watches me do it. When do you let them start wearing it? I don't know yet.
author: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: I love St. Ives Apricot Scrub, and you can just get that at CVS - it's so good, though; it's my favorite! Usually I only use that when I shower, because if I don't shower, I'm usually too tired to wash my face and just use Maybelline cleansing wipes. And then I use Chanel Hydra Beauty Lotion. That's so good, I love it.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: I feel prematurely old. I'm actually having this major belated quarter-life crisis. I'm turning 30 in a couple of weeks. I've been thinking a lot about mortality. A lot about what I'm going to do with my life and how to enjoy it. One of the things I'm going to work on is being more spontaneous, letting go, embracing the beauty of come-what-may.
author: Chris Pine

quote: Grace in women has more effect than beauty.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Who among us has never looked up into the heavens on a starlit night, lost in wonder at the vastness of space and the beauty of the stars?
author: Jeb Bush

quote: The artistic part of us all - I think that the easiest way to appreciate this - is through architecture. Architecture is very impressive; the beauty of buildings, temples.
author: Carlos Slim

quote: Textbook science is beautiful! Textbook science is comprehensible, unlike mere fascinating words that can never be truly beautiful. Elementary science textbooks describe simple theories, and simplicity is the core of scientific beauty. Fascinating words have no power, nor yet any meaning, without the math.
author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

quote: I would rather be adorned by beauty of character than jewels. Jewels are the gift of fortune, while character comes from within.
author: Plautus

quote: The beauty of social awareness is that a few simple adjustments to what you say can vastly improve your relationships with other people.
author: Travis Bradberry

quote: Art should never be limited - the beauty of art is that it gives us the freedom to go places where we wouldn't go to in our normal lives. Inside, I'm just so many different people. I go from the pretty girl on the red carpet to the singer at Ozzfest, spitting in the crowd. That's Jada.
author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quote: I was the kind nobody thought could make it. I had a funny Boston accent. I couldn't pronounce my R's. I wasn't a beauty.
author: Barbara Walters

quote: I hope that in some way that I can be some sort of beacon of hope, especially because I am not the typical Hollywood beauty.
author: Octavia Spencer

quote: In many a piece of music, it's the pause or the rest that gives the piece its beauty and its shape. And I know I, as a writer, will often try to include a lot of empty space on the page so that the reader can complete my thoughts and sentences and so that her imagination has room to breathe.
author: Pico Iyer

quote: I never quite understood why Disney hadn't made a sincere fairy tale since 'Beauty and the Beast.'
author: John Lasseter

quote: In a general sense, I think it's bad to bring too much money into climbing, since it takes away a little from the beauty of the mountains. But at the same time, I can't blame the Nepali government - or the Indian, Pakistani or Chinese, depending on where you're climbing - from wanting to capitalize on foreign climbers.
author: Alex Honnold

quote: What is more beautiful than a sea of water with a number of white-winged boats skirting its surface? Poetry and beauty contesting with the wind and the waves!
author: George Matthew Adams

quote: Hollywood needs to recognise all shades of African American beauty.
author: Gabrielle Union

quote: The absence of flaw in beauty is itself a flaw.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: I'm very accepting with my age. It's like notches on your belt: experience, wisdom, and a different kind of beauty. There comes a day when you've become comfortable in your skin.
author: Zoe Saldana

quote: People are craving this great progress in electronics, going after computers, the Internet, etc. It's a giant progress technologically. But they must have a balance of soul, a balance for human beauty. That means art has an important role.
author: Mstislav Rostropovich

quote: Mastery over the body - its impulses, its needs, its size - is paramount; to lose control is to risk beauty, and to risk beauty is to risk desirability, and to risk desirability is to risk entitlement to sexuality and love and self-esteem.
author: Caroline Knapp

quote: A woman wants to be romanced. She wants to be an essential part of a great adventure; she wants a beauty to unveil. That is what little girls play at, and those are the movies women love and the stories that they love.
author: John Eldredge

quote: Our situation today shows that beauty demands for itself at least as much courage and decision as do truth and goodness, and she will not allow herself to be separated and banned from her two sisters without taking them along with herself in an act of mysterious vengeance.
author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quote: It is, finally, a word is untimely in three different senses, and bearing it as one's treasure will not win one anyone's favours; one rather risks finding oneself outside everyone's camp... Beauty is the word that shall be our first.
author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quote: We no longer dare to believe in beauty and we make of it a mere appearance in order the more easily to dispose of it.
author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quote: Talent survives and remains while beauty is diluted.
author: Gael Garcia Bernal

quote: If our hearts are ready for anything, we are touched by the beauty and poetry and mystery that fill our world.
author: Tara Brach

quote: There is in true beauty, as in courage, something which narrow souls cannot dare to admire.
author: William Congreve

quote: Smart beauty is about looking your best and feeling your best and never overpaying for it.
author: Stacy London

quote: There's a beauty in being part of a band, when there's equality and trust.
author: Scott Weiland

quote: I'm a little quirky, a little offbeat, and I'm certainly not a classic beauty.
author: Ari Graynor

quote: Beauty is that which is simultaneously attractive and sublime.
author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: Sunscreen, in the world of beauty, is the ultimate in adulting.
author: Emily Weiss

quote: Shame, like beauty, is often in the eye of the beholder.
author: Julie Burchill

quote: What sort of sap doesn't know by now that picture-perfect beauty is all done with smoke and mirrors anyway?
author: Julie Burchill

quote: I feel French is very close to Urdu. Both languages are beautiful. Sadly, their beauty is lost in translation.
author: Amisha Patel

quote: We all have to find beauty within us, as opposed to just our exterior.
author: Shay Mitchell

quote: Whereas religious prayers sing of peace and harmony, religion has divided human beings through an atrocious history of enmity and bloodshed. Yet, behind the veil of superficiality and hypocrisy, I always believed in the inherent beauty of God that lies at the essence of all true spiritual paths.
author: Radhanath Swami

quote: Only when inspired to go beyond consciousness by some extraordinary insight does beauty manifest unexpectedly.
author: Arthur Erickson

quote: Filipinos want beauty. I have to look beautiful so that the poor Filipinos will have a star to look at from their slums.
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: Growing up, I was a bit of a tomboy; feminine things took a while to find their place in my world. But diamonds made me understand the magic and beauty of jewelry.
author: Erika Christensen

quote: Her beauty didn't do her any good and she couldn't use it in any positive way or manipulative way. I just hope that people will look and see and believe in that hope of love, that hope of freedom, even if it was just for a limited time.
author: Diane Kruger

quote: So much of the mainstream media has taught us what beauty is, but everyone is beautiful.
author: Chrissy Metz

quote: I think beauty comes from within. If you're happy and look at life in the best way you can, even when there are problems, it can make you beautiful on the outside.
author: Faith Hill

quote: After a decade this glum, we deserved a shot of 'Glee,' a show that restored our faith in the power of song, the beauty of dance, and the magic of 'spirit fingers' to chase our cares and woes into somebody else's backyard.
author: James Wolcott

quote: The reason that the all-American boy prefers beauty to brains is that he can see better than he can think.
author: Farrah Fawcett

quote: Life doesn't care about your vision. Stuff happens, and you've just got to deal with it. You roll with it; that's the beauty of it all.
author: Harold Ramis

quote: Set your compass to beauty, humor, and grief; stay the course no matter what, and I'll support you with everything I've got.
author: Chris Jordan

quote: I love to operate in a world that values things outside of beauty. It's just more what I feel comfortable doing.
author: Troian Bellisario

quote: It's not just Ethiopia, but Africa in general - most of the media concentrates on what's not going well. But there is so much beauty there. When you go, it changes everything. It changes you, your life, and the way you see things. The challenge is changing the image of Africa that's been anchored in people for years now.
author: Liya Kebede

quote: I think the beauty and mystery of boxing is just the immediacy of how it reveals people unlike anything else.
author: Brin-Jonathan Butler

quote: The notion of the infinite variety of detail and the multiplicity of forms is a pleasing one; in complexity are the fringes of beauty, and in variety are generosity and exuberance.
author: Annie Dillard

quote: Beauty and the Beast seemed like it all was really brown. The whole thing was just so brown and orange and yellow, like Burger King or something. I don't think I would have liked Beauty and the Beast at any age.
author: Mike Judge

quote: Coercion may prevent many transgressions; but it robs even actions which are legal of a part of their beauty. Freedom may lead to many transgressions, but it lends even to vices a less ignoble form.
author: Wilhelm von Humboldt

quote: Beauty attracts us men; but if, like an armed magnet it is pointed, beside, with gold and silver, it attracts with tenfold power.
author: Jean Paul

quote: I envy the sensibility in Europe, appreciating beauty in women as they age. I'm going to go that way. I might dye my gray hair for a bit, but beyond that the buck stops. I'm not having any work done.
author: Rachel Bilson

quote: The beauty of Maine is such that you can't really see it clearly while you live there. But now that I've moved away, with each return it all becomes almost hallucinatory: the dark blue water, the rocky coast with occasional flashes of white sand, the jasper stone beaches along the coast, the pine and fir forests somehow vivid in their stillness.
author: Alexander Chee

quote: Storytelling is about patience, about making sense of the moments of pathos and beauty that you find, and about carrying these moments back into your own life.
author: Michael Paterniti

quote: My work is not about 'form follows function,' but 'form follows beauty' or, even better, 'form follows feminine.'
author: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: In terms of being a 'sneakerhead,' there was one point where I was obsessively following every sneaker blog. That's the beauty of Twitter: To get the heads up on what's coming out.
author: Questlove

quote: I'm flatchested, I'm short, I'm brunette, I have droopy eyes, and so people have a hard time casting me as a 'beauty.'
author: Selma Blair

quote: Congress has an obligation to protect our country's natural beauty, embodied in our nation's parks, rivers, and breathtaking landscapes.
author: Dave Reichert

quote: My all time favourite films - one is 'Mary Poppins,' and the other one is 'Pakeezah.' 'Pakeezah' was an Indian film. The beauty of 'Pakeezah' was that it had a soundtrack which was pure poetry.
author: Art Malik

quote: I didn't even know what a beauty editor was. It sounds like a fictional job if you think about it. You get to test lipstick and perfume and nail polish legitimately and call it work.
author: Zoe Foster Blake

quote: The spirit of L.A. is untamed wilderness. It's earthquakes and wildfires and oceans and mountain lions and fog. There's great physical beauty.
author: Dan Gilroy

quote: I never in a million years thought I would be the person to go to for self-esteem; that was not my intent. But I happen to love beauty, I love the way people look, and I love making women look beautiful.
author: Bobbi Brown

quote: Endeavour to be faithful, and if there is any beauty in your thought, your style will be beautiful; if there is any real emotion to express, the expression will be moving.
author: George Henry Lewes

quote: Beauty is only skin deep. If you go after someone just because she's beautiful but don't have anything to talk about, it's going to get boring fast. You want to look beyond the surface and see if you can have fun or if you have anything in common with this person.
author: Amanda Peet

quote: My beauty tricks revolve around eyes. For the early morning shoots, I pop eye pads in the freezer the night before, and when I take them out in the morning they are already cold and active and are great under my eyes. I keep my eye pads right next to my red velvet Ben & Jerry's in the freezer.
author: Christine Teigen

quote: I felt I had to share Idaho with my friend from New York because he'd shared New York with me, so I was going to share the beauty of nature with a man who went to museums and clubs late at night. But there was nothing to do where I lived at night.
author: Mariel Hemingway

quote: The expression of beauty is in direct ratio to the power of conception the artist has acquired.
author: Gustave Courbet

quote: Doors open because you're beautiful, but I wouldn't cultivate beauty to the exclusion of brains.
author: Tia Carrere

quote: A woman's beauty is one of her great missions.
author: Richard Le Gallienne

quote: To me, 'beauty' means to be natural, creative, honest - to say the truth.
author: Nawal El Saadawi

quote: I can hold a cup of sake on a full moon in Japan, and the reflection of the moon in that little cup can make me feel so enthusiastic about beauty. That one good, magical moment can give me enough to create other things like the teardrop earring or necklace.
author: Elsa Peretti

quote: You think about the beauty and what you want to transmit. If I think about designing, I can't design.
author: Elsa Peretti

quote: Natural beauty products are a must! I use coconut oil-based RMS makeup, and I slather almond oil on my hands to soak while I watch a movie.
author: Phoebe Tonkin

quote: Beauty connotes humanity. We call a natural object beautiful because we see that its form expresses fitness, the perfect fulfillment of function.
author: Moshe Safdie

quote: Our hearts were drunk with a beauty Our eyes could never see.
author: George William Russell

quote: We Orientals find beauty not only in the thing itself but in the pattern of the shadows, the light and darkness which that thing provides.
author: Junichiro Tanizaki

quote: My sisters and I were fortunate to travel through Asia and Europe at very young ages. We confronted extraordinary beauty in Athens and unspeakable poverty in India.
author: Mary Chapin Carpenter

quote: Teenagers, especially girl ones, seem like the perfect canary-in-the-coal-mine characters to me. They capture American culture and its perversion, its hypocrisy - how absorbed we are with youth and beauty and sexualized imagery, for instance, while preaching abstinence and modesty.
author: Antonya Nelson

quote: Of course, all of the software I write runs on Linux; that's the beauty of standards, and of cross-platform code. I don't have to run your OS, and you don't have to run mine, and we can use the same applications anyway!
author: Jamie Zawinski

quote: That's the beauty of the acting world. You can play so many different characters who know and do so many things that you have no idea about as yourself. So I'm a big fan of workshops and classes and learning new things because you can always apply it. It's your little supply bag of creativity. Keep filling it up.
author: Daniela Ruah

quote: The beauty of a relationship is when you get used to a person; it is not sudden. It is just a process, and you don't realise when love happens.
author: Riteish Deshmukh

quote: Whether we think of Disney's blonde beauty and her pumpkin carriage or Marissa Meyer's recent recasting of 'Cinderella' as a cyborg in the young adult novel 'Cinder,' we know that there are countless modern retellings of the tale.
author: Marie Rutkoski

quote: What's interesting about architects is, we always have tried to justify beauty by looking to nature, and arguably, beautiful architecture has always been looking at a model of nature.
author: Greg Lynn

quote: In a world where it is so easy to neglect, deny, corrupt and suppress the truth, the scientist may find his discipline severe. For him, truth is so seldom the sudden light that shows new order and beauty; more often, truth is the uncharted rock that sinks his ship in the dark.
author: John Cornforth

quote: I always say beauty is only sin deep.
author: Hector Hugh Munro
