quote: Beauty, of course, is the most important requirement and the paramount asset of the applicant.
author: Florenz Ziegfeld

quote: Science shows us truth and beauty and fills each day with a fresh wonder of the exquisite order which governs our world.
author: Polykarp Kusch

quote: No eyes that have seen beauty ever lose their sight.
author: Jean Toomer

quote: Birth and death are the most singular events we experience - and the contemplation of death, as of birth, should be a thing of beauty, not ignobility.
author: Jacob K. Javits

quote: Life is one long decay, no? There's a lot of beauty in it. Like the patina in an old city.
author: Urs Fischer

quote: Far from creating a new formalism, what these can yield is something far transcending surface values since they not only embody form as beauty, but also form in which intuitions or ideas or conjectures have taken visible substance.
author: Max Bill

quote: So much inspires me. People living their lives with courage, beauty of all kinds, nature in all its aspects, people I love and people I hardly know, and, of course, other poets.
author: Ellen Bass

quote: Poetry allies itself with beauty - a supreme union - but never uses it as its ultimate goal or sole nourishment.
author: Saint-John Perse

quote: First, there is the bare beauty of the logs themselves with their long lines and firm curves. Then there is the open charm felt of the structural features which are not hidden under plaster and ornament, but are clearly revealed, a charm felt in Japanese architecture.
author: Gustav Stickley

quote: Wisdom I know is social. She seeks her fellows. But Beauty is jealous, and illy bears the presence of a rival.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: You don't have to be a renowned artist like Q-Tip to try your hand at poetry. You don't need any special equipment - that's the beauty of it.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: I think permitting the game to become too physical takes away a little bit of the beauty.
author: John Wooden

quote: Some people would claim that things like love, joy and beauty belong to a different category from science and can't be described in scientific terms, but I think they can now be explained by the theory of evolution.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Beauty is indeed a good gift of God; but that the good may not think it a great good, God dispenses it even to the wicked.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: To look almost pretty is an acquisition of higher delight to a girl who has been looking plain for the first fifteen years of her life than a beauty from her cradle can ever receive.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Beauty in distress is much the most affecting beauty.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: The ideal beauty is a fugitive which is never found.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: I wanted very much to learn to draw, for a reason that I kept to myself: I wanted to convey an emotion I have about the beauty of the world.
author: Richard P. Feynman

quote: All the great religions have a place for awe, for ecstatic transport at the wonder and beauty of creation.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: Teach us that wealth is not elegance, that profusion is not magnificence, that splendor is not beauty.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I'm just glad I was able to return to some of that innocence and beauty I had as a child when I started my own family, and my children brought me back some of that spirit.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: Old hands soil, it seems, whatever they caress, but they too have their beauty when they are joined in prayer. Young hands were made for caresses and the sheathing of love. It is a pity to make them join too soon.
author: Andre Gide

quote: The thing that surprised me the most is just how much money women that weren't rich were paying for their hair. When you're in a beauty parlor in Harlem next to abandoned buildings and somebody's paying five grand for a weave, that's a bit much.
author: Chris Rock

quote: Even though I've been putting out bodies of work for years, 'Beauty Behind the Madness' felt like the beginning.
author: The Weeknd

quote: The beauty of the Democratic Party is in the mix.
author: Nancy Pelosi

quote: Children, dear and loving children, can alone console a woman for the loss of her beauty.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: It is well known that Beauty does not look with a good grace on the timid advances of Humour.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Encourage good music and art and literature in your homes. Homes that have a spirit of refinement and beauty will bless the lives of your children forever.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: What I see everywhere in the world are ordinary people willing to confront despair, power, and incalculable odds in order to restore some semblance of grace, justice, and beauty to this world.
author: Paul Hawken

quote: We make such terrible mistakes with visual choices about beauty.
author: Marina Abramovic

quote: If you see a Renaissance body, this is completely ugly in this time. Everybody has to be skinny. But the Renaissance body with incredible flow of the meat everywhere, it was beauty.
author: Marina Abramovic

quote: Some songs you get. Some songs you may not. And I think that's the beauty of art: to question and to ask, to understand the deeper meaning after two or three or four listenings.
author: Janelle Monae

quote: The love of beauty in its multiple forms is the noblest gift of the human cerebrum.
author: Alexis Carrel

quote: Life deprived of beauty is not worthy of being called human.
author: Luis Barragan

quote: There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness.
author: Maria Mitchell

quote: I know I'm not a woman's fantasy man; I don't have to uphold this image of male beauty, so that's kind of a relief in a way.
author: Steve Carell

quote: Beauty can come in strange forms.
author: James Dyson

quote: Beauty of expression is so akin to the voice of the sea.
author: George Matthew Adams

quote: Don't look at small business as a means to an end and a way to make money until the corporation hires you; look at it as a chance to create something of immeasurable value and beauty in a world that desperately needs it.
author: Michael E. Gerber

quote: In my personal opinion, you miss out on the beauty of the moment if you go in planning what the moment is. It's like having a vacation too jam-packed with activities. You miss all of the sunsets.
author: Brie Larson

quote: I like creating beauty out of scary things.
author: Grimes

quote: The sculptor who deals with form seeks to imprison beauty in a marble statue that will withstand the ravages of time during millenniums; but a marble statue is cold and speaks to but a few of the most evolved who are able to infuse the statue with their own life.
author: Max Heindel

quote: I like aristocracy. I like the beauty of aristocracy. I like the hierarchical feeling.
author: James Salter

quote: How goodness heightens beauty!
author: Milan Kundera

quote: Beauty is the disinterested one, without which the ancient world refused to understand itself, a word which both imperceptibly and yet unmistakably has bid farewell to our new world, a world of interests, leaving it to its own avarice and sadness.
author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quote: Being proud of who we are as people is more important than cutting into ourselves to create this false idea of beauty.
author: Isla Fisher

quote: If you look at most beauty advertisements, you would think that makeup is only for beautiful women in their early twenties.
author: Isabella Rossellini

quote: My mother and my two grandmothers, I was lucky to have three women around me growing up that were very special, very elegant women, very beautiful women. They were my first step into the beauty world, let's say, and then the fashion world, of course.
author: Francois Nars

quote: My mother never wore much make-up, and she was a kind of natural beauty; she knew just how to enhance what she had.
author: Francois Nars

quote: Embrace the color of your skin and your own beauty.
author: Yuna

quote: A woman can be very beautiful and an ideal model and she will photograph incredibly well, but she'll appear in film and it won't work. What works is some fusion of physical beauty with some mental field or whatever you call it. I don't know.
author: Oliver Stone

quote: Aesthetics - rather than reason - shapes our thought processes. First comes aesthetics, then logic. 'Thinking in Numbers' is not about an attempt to impress the reader but to include the reader, draw the reader in, by explaining my experiences - the beauty I feel in a prime number, for example.
author: Daniel Tammet

quote: I have always loved beauty and fashion. Some of my earliest memories are of being surrounded by fragrances and lipstick samples.
author: Aerin Lauder

quote: I really like to be able to have variety and to try different things - that's the beauty of fashion.
author: Leighton Meester

quote: Writing for the page is only one form of writing for the eye. Wherever solemn inscriptions are put up in public places, there is a sense that the site and the occasion demand a form of writing which goes beyond plain informative prose. Each word is so valued that the letters forming it are seen as objects of solemn beauty.
author: James Fenton

quote: As soon as beauty is sought not from religion and love, but for pleasure, it degrades the seeker.
author: Annie Dillard

quote: The beauty of a main title is that you establish your main theme and maybe a bit of your secondary theme. You plant the seed that you're going to go water later in the score. And so, having that removed just made it so much more difficult.
author: Danny Elfman

quote: Not just as a black woman, but as a woman, since the beginning of time, beauty has been our responsibility.
author: Nicole Ari Parker

quote: I'm in love with beauty and things and people and love and being in love, and those things, I think, on the inside, show on the outside.
author: Gloria Vanderbilt

quote: But when I was twelve years old I caught my first strong glimpse of one of the fundamental forces of existence, whose votary I was destined to be for life - namely, Beauty.
author: Georg Brandes

quote: The Western man declares that in order to be beautiful, a woman must look 14 years old. If she dares to look 50, or worse, 60, she is beyond the pale. By putting the spotlight on the female child and framing her as the ideal of beauty, he condemns the mature woman to invisibility.
author: Fatema Mernissi

quote: I graduated high school, and I did my internship at Dove in their public relations department because I thought I wanted to be in PR, which turns out I did not. It was right when they were coming out with the Campaign for Real Beauty, so I got an inside view on the whole thing.
author: Katherine Schwarzenegger

quote: All my writing is about the recognition that there is no single reality. But the beauty of it is that you nevertheless go on, walking towards utopia, which may not exist, on a bridge which might end before you reach the other side.
author: Marguerite Young

quote: The singular point of beautiful objects, and people, is that they are experienced not as parts, or ratios between cheekbones and chin, but as wholes. The experience of beauty is a perception, but it is one that mixes up various other sensations and makes them converge in a particular way.
author: Charles Jencks

quote: Let your watchword be order and your beacon beauty.
author: Daniel Burnham

quote: It is Leistikow's lasting achievement - and will always remain so - that he found a style that can express the melancholy charm of the surroundings of Berlin. We see the Grunewald lakes and those on the upper Spree through his eyes; he has taught us to see their beauty.
author: Max Liebermann

quote: Beauty is less important than quality.
author: Eugene Ormandy

quote: My education in the arts began at the Cleveland Museum of Art. As a Cleveland child, I visited the museum's halls and corridors, gallery spaces and shows, over and over. For me, the Cleveland Museum was a school of my very own - the place where my eyes opened, my tastes developed, my ideas about beauty and creativity grew.
author: Agnes Gund

quote: The real sin against life is to abuse and destroy beauty, even one's own even more, one's own, for that has been put in our care and we are responsible for its well-being.
author: Katherine Anne Porter

quote: I was always anti-marriage. I didn't understand monogamy. I couldn't figure out how that could last. And then I met Bryn and I started to understand the beauty of constancy and history and change and going on the roller coaster with someone - of having a partner in life.
author: Maria Bello

quote: The real message of the Dance opens up the vistas of life to all who have the urge to express beauty with no other instrument than their own bodies, with no apparatus and no dependence on anything other than space.
author: Ruth St. Denis

quote: Beauty is only temporary, but your mind lasts you a lifetime.
author: Alicia Machado

quote: Beauty, unlike the rest of the gifts handed out at birth, does not require dedication, patience and hard work to pay off. But it's also the only gift that does not keep on giving.
author: Paulina Porizkova

quote: Coming in solemn beauty like slow old tunes of Spain.
author: John Masefield

quote: A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.
author: Jean Ingelow

quote: Beauty is often worse than wine; intoxicating both the holder and beholder.
author: John Zimmerman

quote: I don't think anyone who has been to Africa comes away untouched by the place. You see a lot of beauty and optimism, but you also come away with an awareness of the huge gulf between what most of us have and what most of them have to make do with. Then, every now and then, a famine or a war makes everything a hundred times worse.
author: Gary Frank

quote: I always loved Belle from 'Beauty and the Beast'. I always thought I looked like her, so I dressed like her for every Halloween.
author: Sofia Carson

quote: I'm not trying to stump anybody... it's the beauty of the language that I'm interested in.
author: Buddy Holly

quote: The beauty of the past belongs to the past.
author: Margaret Bourke-White

quote: The vision is to restore Avon to an iconic beauty brand and to our leadership position in global direct selling, as well as continuing to ensure that we live up to our mission of empowering women.
author: Sheri McCoy

quote: A small house must depend on its grouping with other houses for its beauty, and for the preservation of light air and the maximum of surrounding open space.
author: Clarence Stein

quote: Beauty and folly are old companions.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Beauty is all very well at first sight; but who ever looks at it when it has been in the house three days?
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Imagination disposes of everything; it creates beauty, justice, and happiness, which are everything in this world.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Beauty is a fragile gift.
author: Ovid

quote: Even in the centuries which appear to us to be the most monstrous and foolish, the immortal appetite for beauty has always found satisfaction.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: A beauty is a woman you notice; a charmer is one who notices you.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: I thought of Paris as a beauty spot on the face of the earth, and of London as a big freckle.
author: James Weldon Johnson

quote: Like charity, I believe glamour should begin at home.
author: Loretta Young

quote: I think it's huge that I'm wearing my natural hair texture on ABC in prime time. As Dr. Rainbow Johnson on 'Black-ish,' I think my hair is part of the reality of this woman's life. She has four children and is an anesthesiologist and a wife. She doesn't have a lot of time to fuss with beauty, so her look is pretty simple.
author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: I was not a good-lookin' girl. I was extremely skinny. I wasn't pretty. I wasn't cool.
author: Celine Dion

quote: The beautiful remains so in ugly surroundings.
author: Malcolm de Chazal

quote: Solitude gives birth to the original in us, to beauty unfamiliar and perilous - to poetry. But also, it gives birth to the opposite: to the perverse, the illicit, the absurd.
author: Thomas Mann

quote: I don't need plastic in my body to validate me as a woman.
author: Courtney Love

quote: Beauty products always cheer me up and give me hope. If it makes you feel pretty, why not?
author: Salma Hayek

quote: Beauty comes in all forms. It's not just external; it's internal as well.
author: Alessia Cara

quote: Beauty is only skin deep, but it's a valuable asset if you're poor or haven't any sense.
author: Vernon Howard

quote: Growing up, I was obsessed with Disney movies like 'The Little Mermaid,' 'Aladdin' and 'Beauty And The Beast.' I was always singing the songs from these movies, so to find myself in the studio with Alan Menken was an amazing experience. In fact, it was a dream come true.
author: Mandy Moore

quote: Without realizing it, the individual composes his life according to the laws of beauty even in times of greatest distress.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: I'd like to grow up and be beautiful. I know it doesn't matter, but it doesn't hurt.
author: Kirsten Dunst

quote: Nothing can atone for the lack of modesty; without which beauty is ungraceful and wit detestable.
author: Richard Steele

quote: I sincerely feel that beauty largely comes from within.
author: Christy Turlington

quote: The beauty of Toronto is that it has not been shot a lot in movies, for itself at least. I mean, most of the time, Toronto is shot to portray something else.
author: Denis Villeneuve

quote: I think confidence is a true form of beauty.
author: Becky G

quote: What delights us in visible beauty is the invisible.
author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
author: Jacqueline Bisset

quote: Some guys say beauty is only skin deep. But when you walk into a party, you don't see somebody's brain. The initial contact has to be the sniffing.
author: James Caan

quote: The plainer the dress, the greater luster does beauty appear.
author: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax

quote: My dad had this philosophy that if you tell children they're beautiful and wonderful then they believe it, and they will be. So I never thought I was unattractive. But I was never one of the girls at school who had lots of boyfriends.
author: Emily Mortimer

quote: Having inner beauty is something you develop on your own, and I like to think I have that.
author: Cindy Margolis

quote: It's amazing what sleep does for your looks.
author: Emily Procter

quote: My beauty secret is to try to keep my heart as open and happy as I can, because it really makes the sad lines on my face look better.
author: Lea Thompson

quote: Because beauty isn't enough, there must be something more.
author: Eva Herzigova

quote: Though beauty gives you a weird sense of entitlement, it's rather frightening and threatening to have others ascribe such importance to something you know you're just renting for a while.
author: Candice Bergen

quote: There is no racial or ethnic involvement in Thanksgiving, and people who may be very distant from the Christian system can see the beauty and the positive spirit that comes from the holiday.
author: John Clayton

quote: Always think of what is useful and not what is beautiful. Beauty will come of its own accord.
author: Nikolai Gogol

quote: There are no moral lectures in 'Lookaway, Lookaway;' there aren't even any lessons. But there is passion. It is a work that hides its craft but never its beauty, that is ambitious but never pretentious, that does not sacrifice nuance for power or power for nuance.
author: Cathleen Schine

quote: Avon invented the concept of direct marketing and direct selling beauty. And that's still very valid to us. We'll have a firm that will be around for another 114 years as strongly as it was the first 114.
author: Andrea Jung

quote: But the gravest difficulty, and perhaps the most important, in poetry meant solely for recitation, is the difficulty of achieving verbal beauty, or rather of making verbal beauty tell.
author: Lascelles Abercrombie

quote: When everything else physical and mental seems to diminish, the appreciation of beauty is on the increase.
author: Bernard Berenson

quote: Beauty is the first present nature gives to women and the first it takes away.
author: Fay Weldon

quote: O human beauty, what a dream art thou, that we should cast our life and hopes away on thee!
author: Bryan Procter

quote: I'm very proud of my love for Whitney Houston. She really changed my life. She made my life a better life. She was so beautiful in her love for God, her love for her family and her love for music. She truly loved her music. She could do everything! She had flawless rhythm, flawless pitch, flawless feeling, and flawless beauty.
author: Narada Michael Walden

quote: Every year of my life I grow more convinced that it is wisest and best to fix our attention on the beautiful and the good, and dwell as little as possible on the evil and the false.
author: Richard Cecil

quote: I can't live without my beauty products. I love to be in my bathroom with my candles lit, morning, noon and night. I like taking hot baths and hot showers, using my body scrubs and lotions.
author: Traci Bingham

quote: A child does not notice the greatness and the beauty of nature and the splendor of God in his works.
author: Rudolf Otto

quote: You can only perceive real beauty in a person as they get older.
author: Anouk Aimee

quote: Beauty is only skin deep.
author: Thomas Overbury
